Replace.Text: The Kingdom of Numbers and Geometry
After studying "Astrology", the builder's ability to build 37 special improvement facilities, triangular stone circle, square stone circle, and pentagonal stone circle, will be unlocked.
triangular stone ring

+1 [ICON_SCIENCE] science value. Gain an additional +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] tech points after acquiring the "Mathematics" technology. Cannot be adjacent to other triangular stone circles. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith when adjacent to a square stone circle. +1 [ICON_Culture] culture when adjacent to a pentagonal stone circle. Extra +1 after acquiring the "Math" technology. +2 adjacent [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value for adjacent colleges, holy places, and acropolis areas
square stone ring

+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Gain an additional +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith after acquiring the "Mathematics" technology. Cannot be adjacent to other square stone circles. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science when adjacent to a triangular stone circle. +1 [ICON_Culture] culture when adjacent to a pentagonal stone circle. Extra +1 after acquiring the "Math" technology. +2 adjacent [ICON_Faith] faith value for adjacent colleges, holy places, and acropolis areas
pentagonal stone ring

+1 [ICON_Culture] culture value. Gain an additional +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value after acquiring the "Mathematics" technology. Cannot be adjacent to other pentagonal stone circles. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith when adjacent to a square stone circle. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science when adjacent to a triangular stone circle. Extra +1 after acquiring the "Math" technology. +2 adjacent [ICON_Culture] culture value for adjacent colleges, holy places, and acropolis areas
Adjacent triangular stone circles provide +{1_num} [ICON_SCIENCE] science.
Adjacent square stone circles provide +{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith.
Adjacent pentagonal stone circles provide +{1_num} [ICON_Culture] culture.
island
Two, three, five, seven, eleven, thirteen, seventeen, nineteen, twenty-three, twenty-nine, thirty-one, thirty-seven...
Triangle theory
Try to gain [ICON_Science] technology, preferring civilizations that also focus on [ICON_Science] technology.
(You focus on technology value)
37 Glad you focus on tech value
(You don’t focus on technology value)
37 I’m unhappy that you didn’t focus on the tech value
Welcome to the world of numbers.

Based on the inspiration of blood and the teaching of doctrine, 37 has been wandering in the ocean of numbers since he was a child. With his innate intuition and insight into the abstract world, 37 understands everything by turning it into numbers. In other words, she can only understand the world through numbers. In her world, integers are friends, irrational numbers are mediocre, prime numbers are tricky, and summative numbers are kind. 3 is a good number, 6 is a good number, 7 is a good number, 1001 is a good number. If you ask her what happened in 1999, all she'll tell you is: "Great! 1999 is a cute centered triangle number!"

37 has strong feelings about the abstract world and is willing to share this knowledge. She was a passionate scholar, a devout priest, and a cold daughter and friend. It's not that she doesn't have feelings - she just has given them to the abstract, leaving very little for reality and the people around her. Her feelings for people do not arise from interaction, but from the connection between this person and abstraction.

There is no denying that 37 is a genius in the world of mathematics and physics. However, she has always lacked concern for the concrete world. She would calculate whether the dishes on the table were placed at the perfect golden section, but she didn't care what was on the plate. Of course, she also followed the taboos of the sect. You are not allowed to eat beans, you are not allowed to pick up things after they are dropped, you are not allowed to touch the white rooster... She also accepts the existence of these strict commandments, just like the laws of nature. For her, this is how life works, and that's enough. All this is so insignificant compared to the transcendent Kingdom.
37 wants to create a kingdom of numbers and geometry.
Use unique improvements to create the bonuses you need to drive your winning strategy.
Two, three, five, seven, eleven, thirteen, seventeen, nineteen, twenty-three, twenty-nine, thirty-one, thirty-seven...
Two, three, five, seven, eleven, thirteen, seventeen, nineteen, twenty-three, twenty-nine, thirty-one, thirty-seven...
Two, three, five, seven, eleven, thirteen, seventeen, nineteen, twenty-three, twenty-nine, thirty-one, thirty-seven...
A Mandelbrot collection...yes, the same as the island! There is still a place for me in this collection, right where I am standing.
unreasonable!
Calculation time~
Welcome to the world of numbers.
Are you irrational?
What a headache...
Okay, but what does this mean? I mean, what does it prove?
This is so unreasonable
Make friendship with me.
Excellent argument!
This is so unreasonable
Proof once completed is eternal.
Nothing is free in this world.
Gift – Yes, this is my little jar. The little jar of flesh and bone, albeit temporary, always fits our uniform geometry well.
You'd better keep your word. As for myself, I will never make meaningless threats.
This is so unreasonable. (condemn you)
A collection...are you lucky enough to see it?
Then the agreement was passed.
Known... easy to get...
Please listen to me.
Our interests are closely linked. Could the relationship be more formal?
Even the sword is tired of swinging.
I can only have peace here after I get something that belongs to me.
This war consumes forces that should be used against others.
Everything here and elsewhere ultimately returns to pure numbers. It's just that I haven't been able to figure out this formula that points to the future...
Can irrational numbers be allowed to travel freely in our land? No, no, we can't.
Can we, like gentlemen, allow the armies of both sides to march peacefully in parallel in their respective territories?
Let’s just say it. Do you plan to bring them back to peace, or into a killing field?
no no.
So be it.
